spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Thurstwell is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: Thurstwell has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
entries: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, gaining no benefit from cover.
